game.name: TingBase
game.genres: Action, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Leaderboards
game.shortDescription: Tingbase is the most unique shooter game with not 3, not ,5 but 25 abilities for each class. play as tank, healer, ar, smg, revolver, shotgun, or sniper. Taking inspiration from Overwatch and World of Warcraft PvP, Tingbase strives to combine them into the ultimate game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tingbase is the most unique shooter game with not 3, not ,5 but 25 abilities for each class. play as tank, healer, ar, smg, revolver, shotgun, or sniper. Taking inspiration from Overwatch and World of Warcraft PvP, Tingbase strives to combine them into the ultimate game.
